channel.title: Help with mystery box
channel.description: hey i have a hybrid pvp v3 source and im wondering how to add prizes to the mystery box once you click it, for example once you press "open" on the mystery box a random item comes out such as ags or something. I can't find any tutorials on this.

item.title: Help with mystery box
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

PlayerAssist Search “randomBarrows” Below add public int a() { return a[(int) (Math.random()*a.length)]; }

Then Search “public static int Barrows[] = {4708” below add [code]

public static int a[] =
[/code]

Now in ClickItem Add if(itemId == 6199) { if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(6199,1) && c.getItems().freeSlots() >= 3) { c.getItems().deleteItem(6199, 1); c.getItems().addItem(c.getPA().a(), 1); c.sendMessage("Enjoy Your Reward Come Back If You Want More"); } else { c.sendMessage("You Need 3 Inventory Slots"); } }

Post if you need anymore help

Read full topic
